text: You gotta quit when that happens. I know it stinks, but, sometimes you just need to start over. I work with pretty large datasets(>1 Gb) and once and a while I'll try to plot one and then regret it

text: Yes, but I am not moving until I can get out of this window using my keyboard. So far it is ignoring my Ctrl+C and Ctrl+D. Do you have any KillJulia button by any means?
